action_id.title: Action Id
action_id.description: The unique identifier of the action

preconditions.title: Preconditions
preconditions.description: Conditions that must be met before the action can be executed

effects.title: Effects
effects.description: The expected outcomes of the action

Action.title: Action
Action.description:
Represents an action that an agent can perform.

Attributes:
    action_id (str): The unique identifier of the action.
    description (str): A description of the action.
    preconditions (Dict[str, Any]): Conditions that must be met before the action can be executed.
    effects (Dict[str, Any]): The expected outcomes of the action.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value associated with the belief

Belief.title: Belief
Belief.description:
Represents a belief held by an agent.

Attributes:
    description (str): Description of the belief.
    certainty (float): Certainty level of the belief (0-1).
    value (Any): The value associated with the belief.

BranchInfo.title: BranchInfo
BranchInfo.description:
Represents information about a branch.

Attributes:
    name (str): The name of the branch.

CommitInfo.title: CommitInfo
CommitInfo.description:
Represents information about a commit.

Attributes:
    id (str): The unique identifier of the commit.
    message (str): The commit message.

desire_id.title: Desire Id
desire_id.description: The unique identifier of the desire

status.title: Status
status.description: Current status of the desire (active, suspended, completed)

Desire.title: Desire
Desire.description:
Represents a desire held by an agent.

Attributes:
    desire_id (str): The unique identifier of the desire.
    description (str): Description of the desire.
    priority (float): Priority level of the desire.
    status (str): Current status of the desire (active, suspended, completed).

agent_id.title: Agent Id
agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent

beliefs.title: Beliefs
beliefs.description: The agent's current beliefs about the world

environment_state.title: Environment State
environment_state.description: The current state of the environment

EnvironmentalAgent-Input.title: EnvironmentalAgent
EnvironmentalAgent-Input.description:
An agent that interacts with and perceives the environment.

Attributes:
    environment_state (Dict[str, Any]): The current state of the environment.

agent_id.title: Agent Id
agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent

beliefs.title: Beliefs
beliefs.description: The agent's current beliefs about the world

environment_state.title: Environment State
environment_state.description: The current state of the environment

EnvironmentalAgent-Output.title: EnvironmentalAgent
EnvironmentalAgent-Output.description:
An agent that interacts with and perceives the environment.

Attributes:
    environment_state (Dict[str, Any]): The current state of the environment.

Intention-Input.title: Intention
Intention-Input.description:
Represents an intention in the BDI model.

Attributes:
    status (str): The current status of the intention.
    goal (Goal): The goal associated with the intention.
    plan (Plan): The plan to achieve the goal.

Intention-Output.title: Intention
Intention-Output.description:
Represents an intention in the BDI model.

Attributes:
    status (str): The current status of the intention.
    goal (Goal): The goal associated with the intention.
    plan (Plan): The plan to achieve the goal.

KnowledgeBase.title: KnowledgeBase
KnowledgeBase.description:
Represents a knowledge base containing symbolic and neural knowledge.

Attributes:
    id (str): The unique identifier of the knowledge base.
    symbolic_kb (Dict[str, KnowledgeItem]): The symbolic knowledge items.
    neural_kb (Dict[str, KnowledgeItem]): The neural knowledge items.
    graph (Graph): The RDF graph representing the symbolic knowledge.
    sentence_transformer (SentenceTransformerWrapper): The sentence transformer model for encoding text.

KnowledgeItem.title: KnowledgeItem
KnowledgeItem.description:
Represents an item in the knowledge base.

Attributes:
    id (str): The unique identifier of the knowledge item.
    content (Union[str, int, float, dict, list]): The content of the knowledge item.
    embedding (Optional[List[float]]): The embedding vector of the knowledge item.
    metadata (Dict[str, Any]): Additional metadata associated with the knowledge item.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message exchanged between agents.

Performative.title: Performative
Performative.description: Represents the performative of a message in the agent communication language.

PlanStep.title: PlanStep
PlanStep.description:
Represents a step in a plan.

Attributes:
    id (str): The unique identifier of the plan step.
    description (str): The description of the plan step.
    is_completed (bool): Indicates whether the plan step is completed. Defaults to False.
    goal_id (Optional[str]): The identifier of the associated goal, if any. Defaults to None.

agent_id.title: Agent Id
agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent

beliefs.title: Beliefs
beliefs.description: The agent's current beliefs about the world

ProactiveAgent-Input.title: ProactiveAgent
ProactiveAgent-Input.description:
A proactive agent that can deliberate on goals, generate plans, and execute them.

Attributes:
    goals (List[Goal]): List of the agent's goals.
    plans (List[Plan]): List of the agent's plans.
    resources (Dict[str, float]): The agent's resources.

agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent

beliefs.description: The agent's current beliefs about the world

    plans (List[Plan]): List of the agent's plans.
    resources (Dict[str, float]): The agent's resources.

beliefs.description: The agent's current beliefs about the world

ReactiveAgent-Input.title: ReactiveAgent
ReactiveAgent-Input.description:
A reactive agent that responds to stimuli based on predefined rules.

Attributes:
    stimulus_response_rules (List[Dict[str, Any]]): List of stimulus-response rules.

agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent

beliefs.title: Beliefs

expected_output.title: Expected Output
expected_output.description: Clear definition of expected output for the task

action_id.title: Action Id
action_id.description: ID of the action associated with this task

context.title: Context
context.description: IDs of other tasks that will have their output used as context for this task

output.description: Task output, its final result after being executed

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: List of task IDs that this task depends on

id.description: The unique identifier of the goal

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The priority level of the goal

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the goal

subgoals.title: Subgoals
subgoals.description: A list of subgoals associated with the goal

llm_generated_context.title: Llm Generated Context
llm_generated_context.description: Additional context generated by the language model

is_achieved.title: Is Achieved
is_achieved.description: Indicates whether the goal has been achieved

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the goal

parent_goal.description: The parent goal of the current goal

child_goals.description: A list of child goals associated with the current goal

soft_goals.title: Soft Goals
soft_goals.description: A list of soft goals associated with the goal

app__models__goal__Goal-Input.title: Goal
app__models__goal__Goal-Input.description:
Represents a goal in the multi-agent business operating system.

Attributes:
    id (str): The unique identifier of the goal.
    description (str): A description of the goal.
    priority (int): The priority level of the goal.
    status (str): The current status of the goal.
    subgoals (List[str]): A list of subgoals associated with the goal.
    llm_generated_context (Optional[str]): Additional context generated by the language model.
    is_achieved (bool): Indicates whether the goal has been achieved.
    metadata (Dict[str, any]): Additional metadata associated with the goal.
    parent_goal (Optional['Goal']): The parent goal of the current goal.
    child_goals (List['Goal']): A list of child goals associated with the current goal.
    soft_goals (List[SoftGoal]): A list of soft goals associated with the goal.
    contributions (Dict[str, float]): Contributions to parent goals.

app__models__goal__Goal-Output.title: Goal
app__models__goal__Goal-Output.description:
Represents a goal in the multi-agent business operating system.

Attributes:
    id (str): The unique identifier of the goal.
    description (str): A description of the goal.
    priority (int): The priority level of the goal.
    status (str): The current status of the goal.
    subgoals (List[str]): A list of subgoals associated with the goal.
    llm_generated_context (Optional[str]): Additional context generated by the language model.
    is_achieved (bool): Indicates whether the goal has been achieved.
    metadata (Dict[str, any]): Additional metadata associated with the goal.
    parent_goal (Optional['Goal']): The parent goal of the current goal.
    child_goals (List['Goal']): A list of child goals associated with the current goal.
    soft_goals (List[SoftGoal]): A list of soft goals associated with the goal.
    contributions (Dict[str, float]): Contributions to parent goals.

app__models__plan__Plan.title: Plan
app__models__plan__Plan.description:
Represents a plan for achieving a goal.

Attributes:
    id (str): The unique identifier of the plan.
    goal_id (str): The identifier of the associated goal.
    steps (List[PlanStep]): The list of steps in the plan.
    symbolic_plan (Dict): The symbolic representation of the plan.
    llm_plan (Dict): The LLM (Language Model) representation of the plan.
    is_completed (bool): Indicates whether the plan is completed. Defaults to False.
